original_text: These are the sons of Zilpah, whom Laban gave to Leah his daughter; and these she bore to Jacob—sixteen persons.
korean_text: 이들은 라반이 그의 딸 레아에게 준 실바가 야곱에게 낳은 자손들이니 모두 십육 명이라

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Zilpah
whom Laban gave to Leah his daughter
sentences.korean_translation: 라반이 그의 딸 레아에게 준 자들이요

sentences.original_text: and these she bore to Jacob
